Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of cloning rare species. This study was in Iran.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (1 STUDY)

Reproductive success (1 study): A controlled study in IranÂ found that immature eggs of domestic sheep have potential to be used for cloning of Esfahan mouflon.

BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
